fields_of_interest: General and Institutional Affairs, Agriculture, Trade, Consumers, Culture, Education and training, Employment and Social Affairs, Energy, Business and Industry, Environment, Single market, Regional Policy, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety, Digital economy and society, Transport, Climate Action, Communication
